Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

We have ways of dealing with thieves and plunderers like you, {STR_LeaderName}! Soon our army will be at your doorstep. Do not expect us to show any mercy.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
对付你们这些小偷和盗贼，我们自有办法，{STR_LeaderName}！很快，我们的军队就会兵临城下。别指望我们会对你们网开一面。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

{STR_LeaderName}, your petty attempts to oppose the true heirs of the Star Union will soon come to an end. Know that there are special forces on their way to cleanse the planet's surface of your kind!{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
{STR_LeaderName}，你们对星际联盟真正继承人的那点螳臂挡车之举即日崩溃。你们要知道，我们的特种部队正前往肃清你们在星球表面上的族类！{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Look and tremble in fear before the vast forces of the mighty Paragon, {STR_LeaderName}. Too long have your actions defied the will of CORE, and now you shall experience its terrifying power!{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
在战无不胜的完人大军面前颤抖吧，{STR_LeaderName}。你忤逆核心意志已久。现在，你将亲身感受它可怖的力量！{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Our roots feel unpleasant next to you, {STR_LeaderName}. We sought symbiosis, but we received parasites instead. Pests should be swiftly eliminated, lest they spread. Our tendrils come for you, enemy of Sonriel.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
在你身边，我们的根茎很难受，{STR_LeaderName}。我们想找的是共生者，但来的确实寄生虫。我们得快速消灭寄生虫，以防它们扩散。我们的卷须前来对付你了，太阳神之敌。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

{STR_LeaderName}, enemy of light and symbionts. Your oppression will not to be tolerated. Our thorns and stingers are aimed at you and they cannot be stopped. Feel the power of those who bear Sonriel's might!{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
{STR_LeaderName}，光明与共生者之敌。我们不会对你们的压迫置之不理，我们的尖针利刺已奔你去了，不斩草除根，誓不罢休。好好感受太阳神神力加持战士之神威吧！{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Prepare to feel the wrath of Sonriel, {STR_LeaderName}. Mother Node does not accept anyone who defiles her garden. Your walls shall not protect you when our pollen descends upon your cities!{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
准备沐浴太阳神怒火吧，{STR_LeaderName}。母节点对任何侵犯她花园的行为不会置之不理。当我们的花粉大军兵临城下，你们的城墙也只是虚设！{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Entities: detected. Order indicators are at subpar levels. Unruly life forms must be terminated. Target: {STR_LeaderName}. Threat level: low. Protocol: send cleanup crew.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
实体：已检测到。顺从指标处于次佳水准。对不听话的生命形式通通予以消灭。目标：{STR_LeaderName}。威胁等级：低。协议：派遣清理小队。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Sovereignty: in danger. Multiple infringements detected by: {STR_LeaderName}. Crimes compiled. Threat level: medium. Protocol: issue a controlled sweep.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
独立主权：岌岌可危。{STR_LeaderName}检测到多方来犯。罪恶已成。威胁等级：中等。协议：发动适度清理行动。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Dangerous lifeform detected. {STR_LeaderName}: planetary threat. Detention: not an option. Target located. Units on the move. Extermination protocols: eliminate with extreme prejudice.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
检测到危险生物。{STR_LeaderName}：星球遭遇威胁。羁押：不可行。已锁定目标。单位出发。灭绝协议：斩草除根。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added
Physical forms... more dangerous than anticipated. {STR_LeaderName} opposes us. Send hunters in the dark… sleep eternal. Relief.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
实体生命形式…危险程度超乎想象。{STR_LeaderName}胆敢造反。暗中派遣猎手…让它一睡不醒。我们才能高枕无忧。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Your kind is not the superior species… we will prove it. Enraged... your madness ends. Our shoal will consume… {STR_LeaderName}. Your defenses will be breached… by the Void.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
你们不是什么好货…我会证明这一点。你让我很恼火…是该了解你这个疯子了。我们的鱼群又可以饱餐一顿了…{STR_LeaderName}。虚空将会…破掉你们的防御。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

The feeble, physical mind of {STR_LeaderName} wanes… until nothing remains. Disillusioned. Commanding the void of spiraling eternity… we bring madness to your kind. Soon. {XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
不堪一击的{STR_LeaderName}智囊正支离破碎…直到灰飞烟灭。终于醒悟。我们将乘着永盛永生虚空大军…疯狂吞噬你的族类。等着吧。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Look at this scrub. {STR_LeaderName}, you think your guild is tough? Wait 'til you see ours. We'll send you a small party for you to sample, although they will probably break you 'til you're nothing but a sad mess! PWNED.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
看看这个废物。{STR_LeaderName}，你觉得自己的公会很强吗？等着瞧瞧我们的实力。我们会派遣一小支部队给你感受一下。即使就这么一小支部队，也会让你们丢盔弃甲，颜面扫地！嘭。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
Only the string reference between brackets {} was added. This does not require additional localization, apart from the string reference which should be added

Get off our turf n00b. You think yourself OP? Wrong! Our guild is the most OP on this server. We're sending someone in your direction, and they're full of Black Nex - nothin' can stop 'em! They will kick you so hard you won't be able to log back in!{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
滚出我们的地盘，菜鸟。你觉得自己很拽？呵呵！我们的公会才是这个服务器上最强的。我们正朝你们的方向派遣军队，他们浑身充满暗黑之力-无坚不摧！他们会把你们打得不敢重新登入游戏！{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}

n00b' is game slang for someone who is completely new to something (newbie)
'OP' is an abbreviation for "Over powered"

We getting rekt? No way! These scrubs must be hackers. Always another one in an instance! Preacher tells us that a new raid was added to stop the glitchers, at your location {STR_LeaderName}! Can't wait to see what kind of loot ya drop. HAHAHA LUL. This will be your end game.{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}
我们被侵入了？不可能！这些小学生肯定是黑客。总是有人不停侵入实例！从这些黑客所作所为可见，为阻挡缺陷，他们已经发起了新的一轮进攻。{STR_LeaderName}！迫不及待想看看你们掉下什么战利品。哈哈哈哈。期待。这将是你们的终局之战了。{XML_NPC_FACTIONS_STORYEVENTS@NEGOTIATE_PEACE@DESCRIPTION}

Rekt' is game slang for getting wrecked (beaten horribly in a game)
'Scrubs' is game term for someone who's not good at anything.
'LUL' is game slang for LOL
Shows the location of the attacking force
Need values to be transported to resourceEd
Need values to be transported to resourceEd
Look at the sector that is being asked for
Accept a quest from the demanding faction as an alternative action to meet their demand. Failing that quest will have the same consequences as declining the original demand.
接受阵营请求，将其作为备选行动，从而满足它们的要求。没能完成请求与拒绝要求结果一样。
Ah, just the person we are looking for. It has come to our attention that tribute has not been made. Please do so, for the sake of a good relationship, of course.
啊,他就是我们要找的人.我们注意到你们还没上贡。为了两国间友好关系,当然，奉劝你们务必执行。
Cosmite is of finite quantity, a rarity even for the Paragon. To keep good relations with us, we request a tribute.
宇宙合金数量有限，对完人来说更是稀罕物。要跟我们维持友好关系，必须得上贡。
It has come to our attention that the lands you own are rightfully contended by the Paragon. If you want to maintain good relations, we request that you release ownership.
我们注意到你们所拥有的土地实际上是完人的合法领地。若你们想维持友好关系，我们要求你们放弃主权。
We demand Sonriel’s essence to keep symbiosis, {STR_LeaderName}.
我们需要太阳神精华养护共生者，{STR_LeaderName}。
Mother Node demands the alloy of the stars to keep symbiosis, {STR_LeaderName}.
母节点需要星辰合金养护共生者，{STR_LeaderName}。
We demand possession of the soil you claim, to keep symbiosis.
我们需要你们的土地主权，用于养护共生者。
Tribute: required. Entity known as {STR_LeaderName} must make offering to Autonom. If accepted: relations maintained.
贡品：需要。{STR_LeaderName}实体必须向自主机械上贡。若接受：继续处于友好关系
Tribute: required. Material known as: Cosmite. If {STR_LeaderName} wishes to maintain order: offer Cosmite.
贡品：需要。材料名称：宇宙合金。若{STR_LeaderName}想要维持统治：上贡宇宙合金。
Tribute: required. Sector in domain of: {STR_LeaderName}. To maintain relations, {STR_LeaderName} must offer sector to: Autonom.
贡品：需要。统治区域所有者：{STR_LeaderName}。要维护关系，{STR_LeaderName}上贡，接收人：自主机械。
Bright, swirling energy. Lusting. We must have it… to keep the balance.
明亮晃眼的能量。求能若渴。我们必须得得到能量…才能维持平衡。
The material you gather… Cosmite. Familiar to us, vital. To maintain relations… you must sacrifice.
你收集的材料…宇宙合金。我们很熟悉，对我们至关重要。要维持关系…你们必须做出牺牲。
This piece of reality… it belongs to us, to our domain. You must part with it... to maintain order.
这块现实领地…是我们的领土。你们必须释放…才能确保国泰民安。
You wanna keep relations intact with our guild? Then you gotta pay up! A small tribute to keep a healthy relationship.
想要跟我们公会保持友好往来？那你得表示一下！小小的心意是维持健康关系的基石。
If you wanna stay on the Spacers' good list, we're gonna need some of that fancy shiny space metal you have lying around.
如果不想被我们从友好名单除名，你们得给我们些你们那里盛产的闪亮贵金属。
Hey, that land belongs to our guild! If you still wanna be friends with the clan, it's best you hand it over to the Spacers.
嘿，那里是我们公会的领地！如果你不想跟我们撕破脸皮，最好乖乖还给太空族。
We told you to stop helping our rivals, but apparently you’re deaf or somethin’. Last chance to make things right, now give it up!
我们已经奉劝过你们，别再帮助我们的仇敌，但看起来，我们说的话成了耳旁风。给你最后一次机会，回头是岸！
We warned you about helping our rivals, and yet you have ignored our request to stop. Good relations with the Paragon holds a price, and you must pay it to maintain it.
就帮助我们仇敌这事儿，我们已经向你们发出过警告，但是到目前为止，你们依然我行我素。与完人交好得付出代价，要维持友好关系，你们必须表示心意。
We have asked you time and time again, Symbiont. Yet you still defy Mother Node when we ask you to stop aiding our enemies. We demand tribute to maintain symbiosis.
共生者，我们已经多次奉劝过你们了，但是在我们要求你们不要再帮助我们的仇敌时，你们依然公然违抗母节点的命令。要继续维持共生关系，你们得向我们进贡。
Confusion… why do you do this? Dishonor… will not listen. Anger… violent vibrations. We will not ask again, {STR_LeaderName}. Stop helping our enemy. You must pay tribute.
无法理解…你们为啥要这么做？拒不支付…不会听的。恼火…怒不可遏。我们不会再说第二次，{STR_LeaderName}。别再帮助我们的仇敌了。为表诚意，你们必须进贡。
Entity {STR_LeaderName}: you have ignored our request to stop helping Autonom enemies. The price has been set: to maintain Autonom relations.
实体{STR_LeaderName}：对我们提出的停止协助自主机械敌人的要求，你们视若罔闻。代价已设定：维持与自主机械的关系。
[br/][br/](We can negotiate for peace by contacting this faction's dwelling.)
[br/][br/]（我们能通过联系此阵营居住地的方式进行和平谈判。）
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
